securityTestingDescription: Comprehensive security testing suite with automated vulnerability scanning, manual penetration testing, continuous security monitoring, and compliance verification.
securityCommands:
# Full security audit
npm run security:check

# Run security-focused unit tests
npm run test:security

# Test with coverage
npm run test:coverage

# Dependency vulnerability scan
npm run security:audit

manualTesting.title: Security Headers Verification
manualTesting.commands:
# Quick headers check
npm run security:headers

# Or manually:
curl -I http://localhost:3000

manualTesting.title: Input Validation Testing
manualTesting.commands:
# Test malicious input rejection
curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/contact \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"name":"<script>alert(1)</script>","email":"test@example.com","subject":"test","message":"test"}'

manualTesting.title: Rate Limiting Verification
manualTesting.commands:
# Test rate limiting (should trigger on 6th request)
for i in {1..6}; do curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/contact -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"name":"Test","email":"test@example.com","subject":"Test '$i'","message":"Rate limit test"}'; done
